fulltext:
Hung Pham
Product Lead
 hungphambms@gmail.com
  0938.068.100
  Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
I worked for a startup company in Singapore. After that, I worked in all three countries - Singapore, Indonesia and
Malaysia - to support this project. During this time, I learned a lot about teamwork, problem solving and product
thinking.
Experienced Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services
industry. Skilled Angular, NodeJs, Hybrid Mobile App, Agile Methodologies. 
Strong program and project management professional with a Technology Information focused in Computer
Systems Networking and Telecommunications from University Of Science Ho Chi Minh City.
INTERESTS
Being technically minded, I enjoy reading science fiction which allows me to exercise the creative parts of my
thought processes, which in turn develops my problem solving skills. When I have freetime, I research new
technology, new design style and learn more marketing strategy.
University Of Science Ho Chi
Minh City

GPA: 9.3/10
